about.title: About
about.description: Neo Republic is a democratic simulation platform that enables citizens to propose and evaluate political programs anonymously.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect and process information through Firebase services. For detailed information about Firebase's privacy and security practices, including GDPR compliance, data encryption, and data location, please refer to <link>Firebase's Privacy and Security documentation</link>. We collect the following types of information:

items.personal: Personal information provided during registration and profile updates
items.usage: Usage data and interactions with our platform
items.technical: Technical information about your device and connection

dataUse.title: Use of Data
dataUse.description: We use your data for the following purposes:

items.service: To provide and maintain our services
items.improvement: To improve and optimize our platform
items.communication: To communicate important updates and information

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

dataLocation.title: Data Location
dataLocation.description: Your data is stored in Google Cloud Platform's data centers, primarily in the European Union, in compliance with GDPR requirements.

userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

hero.title: Reimagining Democracy Through Policy-First Voting
hero.subtitle: Vote for ideas, not personalities. A new approach to democratic participation.

propose.title: Propose
propose.description: Whether you're a citizen or a political party, submit your program with concrete funding elements

validate.description: If you're an expert, join an advisory team to validate the feasibility of these programs

vote.title: Vote
vote.description: Vote for programs that inspire you. The top 3 programs will be selected to form a common program

govern.title: Govern
govern.description: The authors of the 3 selected programs collaborate to create a common program that meets the majority's expectations

about.title: About This Project
about.description: This democratic simulation aims to shift focus from personality-driven politics to policy-based decision making. By enabling anonymous program submissions and expert validation, we create a space where ideas can be evaluated on their merits alone.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.quality: Improve the quality of political discourse
